segments.text: Have you ever done your shopping at Whole Foods market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't shopped there . How is the food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I go to Sons for my groceries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I prefer the food at Whole Foods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there something wrong with Sons ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sons doesn't offer a lot of organic foods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do they offer organic foods at Whole Foods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's the place to go to get healthier food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe I'll try that store out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like Sons , then I'm sure you'll love Whole Foods .
segments.speaker: S1
